bullets: • Consumer price index rose 3.8% in October, year on year, marking its fastest pace since April

• The largest contributor to consumer inflation was the housing sector that saw price growth of 5.9%, driven by higher costs in electricity, rents and new dwellings
• This is the first time that the ABS has released the complete monthly consumer price index

bullets: • The Predator: Badlands will open with around $40 million this weekend, according to 20th Century Studios (aka Disney) If that number holds up, it’ll be the best debut (ignoring inflation) for any film in the Predator franchise, beating 2004’s AVP: Alien vs
